body.p:
List of shortcuts in
Shortcuts
Shortcut Action
Alt + Shift + Comma Deletes the start and end tag of the current element (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + ForwardSlash Inserts the last tag used by the Surround with tag action (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + E Allows you to choose a tag that encloses a selected portion of content (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + Enter Allows you to edit the attributes of the selected component in Design mode (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + PageDown Collapses all displayed items.
Alt + Shift + PageUp Expands all displayed items.
Alt + Shift + T, C (Command + Alt + T, C on OS X) Opens the Configure Transformation Scenarios dialog box (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + T, T (Command + Alt + T, T on OS X) Opens the Transform with dialog box (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + V, V Validate a document (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + V, W (Command + Alt + V, W on OS X) Check well-formedness of an XML document (Eclipse).
Alt + 1 (Command + Alt + 1 on OS X)
Quick Assist / Quick Fix [Refactoring] - Quick Fix/Assist Stand Alone
Alt + DownArrow
Move Down [DITA Maps Manager] -
Move Down [Schema Diagram Features] -
Move Down [Source] -
Alt + Enter
Edit Attributes [Edit] - When the cursor is positioned inside an element, selecting this shortcut opens an in-place attribute editor.
Edit Attributes [Schema Diagram Features] -
Alt + F5
Run to End [Debugger] - XSLT debugger run to end.
Alt + F7
Step Into [Debugger] - XSLT debugger step into.
Alt + LeftArrow
Promote - Moves the selected node up one level to the level of its parent node.
Alt + RightArrow
Demote - Moves the selected node down one level to the level of its child nodes.
Alt + Shift + C (Command + Alt + C on OS X)
Generate/Convert Schema [Tools] - Generate/Convert Schema
Surround selection with a <![CDATA]]> tag (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + D (Ctrl + Alt + D on OS X)
Split Element [Markup] - Split the element from the cursor location in two identical elements.
Alt + Shift + F (Command + Alt + F on OS X)
Quick Find [Find] - Displays the Quick Find toolbar.
Joins the left and right elements relative to the current cursor location (Eclipse).
Alt + Shift + F7
Step Out [Debugger] - XSLT debugger step out.
Alt + Shift + J (Command + Alt + J on OS X)
Join Elements [Markup] - Joins the left and right elements relative to the current cursor location.
Alt + Shift + P (Command + Shift + P on OS X)
Rename Prefix [Markup] - Renames the prefix of the current element
Alt + Shift + PageDown (Command + Alt + PageDown on OS X)
Collapse All [Results] -
Alt + Shift + PageUp (Command + Alt + PageUp on OS X)
Expand All [Results] -
Alt + Shift + R (Command + Alt + R on OS X)
Rename Component [Refactoring] - Rename the current XML schema element.
Alt + Shift + X (Command + Alt + X on OS X)
Delete Element Tags [Markup] - Deletes the start and end tag of the current element.
Alt + Triple-Click Selects the content of an element in Author mode.
Alt + ForwardSlash (Command + Alt + ForwardSlash on OS X)
Start Content Completion [Content Completion] -
Alt + UpArrow
Move Up [DITA Maps Manager] -
Move Up [Schema Diagram Features] -
Move Up [Source] - Moves the selected node in front of their respective previous sibling.
Ctrl (Command on OS X) key Ctrl/Command modifier key.
Ctrl + MinusSign (Command + MinusSign on OS X) Decreases the font size with one point for each execution of the action. In Grid mode it zooms out.
Ctrl + PlusSign (Command + PlusSign on OS X) Increases the font size with one point for each execution of the action. In Grid mode it zooms in.
Ctrl + 0 (Command + 0 on OS X) or Ctrl + NumPad0 (Command + NumPad0 on OS X) Resets the font size to the value of the editor font set in the Preferences pages.
Ctrl + Backspace (Command + Backspace on OS X) Deletes the previous word.
Ctrl + Delete (Command + Delete on OS X) Deletes the next word.
Ctrl + DownArrow (Command + DownArrow on OS X)
Scrolls the editor down.
In the Open/Find Resource view/dialog box, used in the search field, this shortcut displays the search history.
Ctrl + End (Command + End on OS X) Positions the cursor at the end of the document.
Ctrl + F4 (Command + F4 on OS X) Closes the currently focused editor (Eclipse).
Ctrl + Home (Command + Home on OS X) Positions the cursor at the beginning at the document.
Ctrl + I (Command + I on OS X)/Ctrl + O (Command + O on OS X) Zoom in/Zoom out the image in the SVG Viewer
Ctrl + LeftArrow (Command + LeftArrow on OS X) Navigates to the previous word.
Ctrl + NumPad- (Command + NumPad- on OS X) Folds the elements indented with one level inside the current element (Eclipse).
Ctrl + NumPad- (Command + NumPad- on OS X) or Ctrl + MouseWheelBackwards (Windows/Linux) Decreases the font size with one point for each execution of the action.
Ctrl + NumPad+ (Command + NumPad+ on OS X) Unfolds all child elements of the current element (Eclipse).
Ctrl + NumPad+ (Command + NumPad+ on OS X) or Ctrl + MouseWheelForward (Windows/Linux) Increases the font size with one point for each execution of the action.
Ctrl + RightArrow (Command + RightArrow on OS X) Navigates to the next word.
Ctrl + Right-Click + Drag (Command + Right-Click + Drag on OS X) Rotates the image in the SVG Viewer.
Ctrl + Shift + BackSlash (Command + Shift + BackSlash on OS X) Generate/Convert Schema (Eclipse)
Ctrl + Shift + H (Command + Shift + H on OS X) Converts hexadecimal sequence to character. (Eclipse)
Ctrl + Shift + Tab (Command + Shift + Tab on OS X) Switches between the tabs with opened files in the reverse order.
Ctrl + Space (Command + Space on OS X) Opens the content completion list of proposals.
Ctrl + T (Command + T on OS X)
Resets the dimension of an image in the SVG Viewer.
Invokes the Table Properties action.
Ctrl + Tab (Command + Tab on OS X) Switches between the tabs with opened files in the order most recent ones first.
Ctrl + UpArrow (Command + UpArrow on OS X)
Scrolls the editor up.
In the Open/Find Resource view/dialog box, used in the search field, this shortcut displays the search history.
Ctrl + 1 (Command + 1 on OS X)
Go to 1 [Bookmarks] -
Quick Fix/Assist Eclipse
Ctrl + 2 (Command + 2 on OS X)
Go to 2 [Bookmarks] -
Ctrl + 3 (Command + 3 on OS X)
Go to 3 [Bookmarks] -

Go to 8 [Bookmarks] -
Ctrl + 9 (Command + 9 on OS X)
Go to 9 [Bookmarks] -
Ctrl + A (Command + A on OS X)
Select all [Edit] - Selects the entire content of the editing area.
Select all [Results] -
Ctrl + Alt + Comma Moves the current editor tab one position to the left.
Ctrl + Alt + Period Moves the current editor tab one position to the right.
Ctrl + Alt + LeftArrow (Command + Alt + LeftArrow on OS X) Promote section in DocBook documents.
Ctrl + Alt + RightArrow (Command + Alt + RightArrow on OS X) Demote section in DocBook documents.
Ctrl + Alt + UpArrow (Command + Alt + UpArrow on OS X) Moves node up in Text mode
Ctrl + Alt + D (Command + Alt + D on OS X) Adds documentation blocks for the Component at the current position
Ctrl + Alt + DownArrow (Command + Alt + DownArrow on OS X) Moves node down in Text mode
Ctrl + Alt + B (Command + Alt + B on OS X)
Change the Revision to Browse [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Context-dependent action that allows you to change the selected repository revision using the Change the Revision to Browse dialog box. It is active only when a repository root location is selected.
Ctrl + Alt + C (Command + Alt + C on OS X)
Compare [Compare] -
Ctrl + Alt + CloseBracket (Command + Alt + CloseBracket on OS X)
Forward [Navigation] - Navigates forward to the location of the selected text.
Ctrl + Alt + E (Command + Alt + E on OS X)
Edit Equation [Edit] -
Edit Repository Location [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Context-depended action that allows you to edit the selected repository location using the Edit SVN Repository dialog box. It is active only when a repository location root is selected.
Ctrl + Alt + Enter (Command + Alt + Enter on OS X)
Insert new line after [Edit] - Inserts a new line after the current one
Ctrl + Alt + H (Command + Alt + E on OS X)
Latest from HEAD [Working copy] - Compare with latest from Head.
Ctrl + Alt + I (Command + Alt + I on OS X)
Add to "svn:ignore" [Working copy] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Imports the files selected from the files system in the selected folder from the repository.
Ctrl + Alt + K (Command + Alt + K on OS X)
Find action [Find] - Allows you to look up an action.
Ctrl + Alt + N (Command + Alt + N on OS X)
New Repository Location [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Displays the Add SVN Repository dialog box.
Ctrl + Alt + O (Command + Alt + O on OS X)
Check out [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Allows you to create a working copy from a repository directory, on your local file system. To read more about this operation, see the Check out a working copy section.
Ctrl + Alt + OpenBracket (Command + Alt + OpenBracket on OS X)
Back [Navigation] - Navigates backwards to the location of the selected text.
Ctrl + Alt + P (Command + Alt + P on OS X)
Create patch [Tools] -
Expand All [Tree Editor] -
Ctrl + Alt + R (Command + Alt + R on OS X)
Remove Repository Location [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Allows you to remove the selected repository location from the view. It displays a confirmation dialog box before removal. It is active only when a repository root location is selected.
Revision [Working copy] -
Ctrl + Alt + S
XML Schema Documentation [Tools] -
Ctrl + Alt + T (Command + Alt + T on OS X)
Reopen last closed editor [File] -
Ctrl + Alt + U (Command + Alt + U on OS X)
Copy URL Location [File] - Copies to clipboard the URL location of the selected resource.
Ctrl + Alt + V (Command + Alt + V on OS X)
Add to version control [Working copy] -
Ctrl + Alt + W (Command + Alt + W on OS X)
Switch [Tools] -
Ctrl + Alt + X (Command + Alt + X on OS X)
XSLT Stylesheet Documentation [Tools] - Generate XSLT documentation.
Expand All [Working copy] -
Ctrl + Alt + Z (Command + Alt + Z on OS X)
Collapse All [Repository] -
Collapse All [Working copy] -
Ctrl + B (Command + B on OS X)
First Change [Compare Files] - [Comparison tool shortcut] Jumps to the first change in the comparison window.
Ctrl + C (Command + C on OS X)

Copy [Results] - Copy

Go after Next Tag [XML Document] - Navigates to next XML node in Text mode.

Delete line [Source] -

Find/Replace [Find] - Opens the Find/Replace dialog box.

Open Project [Project] - Opens an existing project in the Project view.

Run to Cursor [Debugger] - XSLT debugger run to cursor.

Ctrl + F9 (Command + F9 on OS X)
Switch Editor Tab - Switches between available editors.
Ctrl + G (Command + G on OS X)
Revision Graph [History] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Display a graphical representation of a resource history. For more details about a resource revision graph see the Revision Graph section.
Last Modification [Navigation] - Navigates to the location of the latest edited text.
Ctrl + H (Command + T on OS X)
Show History [History] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Displays the history of the selected resource. When the operation starts you can set filtering options.
Ctrl + I (Command + I on OS X)
Show SVN Information [File] - Provides additional information for the selected resource.
Indent Selection [Source] - Corrects the indentation of the selected block of lines
Ctrl + J (Command + J on OS X)
Join and Normalize Lines [Source] - Join and normalize lines
Merge [Tools] -
Ctrl + K (Command + K on OS X)
Lock [Locks] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Allows you to lock certain files that you need exclusive access to.

New [File] - Opens the New dialog box.

Ctrl + Shift + G (Command + Shift + G on OS X)
Go to Matching Bracket [Document] - Go to matching character when cursor is located at '{' character or '}' character. It helps for finding quickly matching character of current folding element.
Go to Matching Tag [XML Document] - Moves the cursor to the end tag that matches the start tag, or vice versa.
Ctrl + Alt + G (Command + Alt + G on OS X)
Searches the references of the selected element in all the topics of the current DITA map (the DITA map opened in the DITA Maps Manager view).
Ctrl + Shift + H (Command + Shift + H on OS X)
Convert Hexadecimal Sequence to Character [Source] - Converts hexadecimal sequence to character. (Eclipse)
Find/Replace in Files - Opens the Find/Replace in Files dialog box. (SA)
Ctrl + Shift + I (Command + Shift + I on OS X)
Import Files [Repository] - Allows you to import a file from the file system.
Format and Indent Element [Source] - Pretty prints the element that surrounds the cursor location.
Ctrl + Shift + K (Command + Shift + K on OS X)
Unlock [Locks] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Releases the exclusive access to a file from the repository.
Ctrl + Shift + L (Command + Shift + L on OS X)
Import folder [Repository] - [Syncro SVN Client shortcut] Depending on the selected folder from the repository, allows you to import the contents of a specified folder from the file system into it.
Learn Structure [XML Document] - Learn Structure
Ctrl + Shift + M (Command + Shift + M on OS X)
Mark as Merged [Working copy] - [SVN Client]
Ctrl + Shift + N (Command + Shift + N on OS X)

Previous message [Results] - Jump to the previous message.
Ctrl + Shift + P (Command + Shift + P on OS X)

In Text mode, this shortcut takes you to the definition of a reference.
When editing CSS/LESS files, opens resources.
When you have a multiple selection, this shortcut removes the selection from an item.

DownArrow In the Open/Find Resource view/dialog box, moves the selection to the first item in the results list.
DownArrow/PageDown Navigates towards the ending of the document.
Enter
In the Author mode, opens the content completion list of proposals.
In the Text mode, moves the cursor to a new line.
In Grid mode, begins editing and lets you insert a new value. Also commits the changes after you finish editing.
In the Transformation Scenarios view, executes the highlighted scenario.
Esc
Disables the Highlight mode.
Closes the current dialog box.
F1
Help [Help] - Opens the documentation.
F2
Rename [Archive Browser] -
Rename [File] -
Rename [Project] - Renames resources in the Project ExplorerProject view.

NumPad- In Grid mode, collapses all the children of a node.
NumPad+ In Grid mode, expand all the children of a node.
Shift Used with the navigation keys, creates a selection area.
Shift + Left-Click + Drag Moves the image in the SVG Viewer.
Shift + Delete
Remove from Disk [Project] - In the Project view, removes the selected resource from disk.
Remove from Disk [DITA Maps Manager] - Removes from disk the resource selected in the DITA Maps Manager.

Find Previous [Find] - Used for performing another search in backward direction using the last search configuration

Resource Dependencies [References] -
Shift + F5

Pause [Debugger] - XSLT debugger pause.
Shift + F7 (Command + F8 on OS X)

Shift + Tab
Shift Left [Source] - In Text mode, shifts the selected block to the left.
In Author mode, navigates to the previous XML node.
Promote - In Author mode, promotes selected list item nodes in ordered or unordered lists.
Tab
Shift Right [Source] - In Text mode, shifts the currently selected block to the right.
In Author mode, navigates to next XML node.
Demote - In Author mode, demotes selected list item nodes in ordered or unordered lists.
UpArrow/PageUp Navigates towards the beginning of the document.
Alt + [Letter]
Menu access key shortcut on Windows. Allows to select an action by pressing a highlighted key.
